EmailTemplate.name: ATR Redirect to Portal Orders
EmailTemplate.subject: Placing an Order: Please Use the MyAerospace Web Portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact_Name__c},
Thank you for your request to place an order with Honeywell Aerospace.
Please place your order on the My Aerospace web portal, www.MyAerospace.com. You can also view all order status on the portal. Click here for a short video on how to place an order on MyAerospace.
Thank you. We appreciate your business!
Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support
Due to government regulations and/or contractual limitations, all data and/or attachments containing export control information and/or containing details related to Space, Munitions and Missiles items is not authorized for entry or use in our applications or systems at the present time.
